props.description: Military staff opportunities at AI2C provide a way to contribute meaningfully to the mission without requiring technical expertise in cloud administration or software development. These roles support critical operations through leadership, logistics, policy development, training coordination, and strategic planning. By leveraging their military experience, personnel can help shape AI2C’s initiatives, enhance collaboration across units, and ensure the successful integration of emerging technologies into Army operations. Whether managing projects, facilitating training programs, or providing operational support, military staff play a vital role in advancing AI2C’s mission and strengthening the Army’s capabilities in intelligence and cyber operations.

At AI2C, we take immense pride in working alongside our civilian counterparts, whose expertise and dedication are essential to our mission. Civilian opportunities within AI2C span a variety of roles, from program management and policy development to research, training, and operational support. These professionals bring valuable perspectives, technical proficiency, and institutional knowledge that enhance our ability to drive innovation and execute mission-critical initiatives. Whether supporting intelligence operations, shaping cybersecurity strategies, or streamlining logistics, civilians play a vital role in strengthening AI2C’s impact and advancing the Army’s capabilities in an ever-evolving landscape. Join us and be part of a team that values collaboration, excellence, and service to the nation.

content: Current open posistions can be listed here
